column2: A merchant tucked away in a sparsely populated area of your holding, selling trinkets and baubles from the local area and beyond.
A large wooden platform tucked away in a sparsely populated area of your holding, displaying slaves gathered from lands unknown.
A merchant tucked away in a sparsely populated area of your holding, selling alchemical potions and salves for various ailments.
A local gypsy has taken up residence in this ornate wagon. Perhaps she can be of use?
A tall building seated just beyond the walls of your castle. It is home to those who have an inclination toward magic and the desire to learn about the aether.
[lf_new_kitsune.GetDynName] has arrived at your court, attracted by your Kitsune Shrine.
[lf_new_neko.GetDynName] has arrived at your court, attracted by your Neko Playroom.
[lf_new_elf.GetDynName] has arrived at your court, attracted by your ElvenFletcher.
[lf_new_fairy.GetDynName] has arrived at your court, attracted by your Fairy Garden.
[lf_new_orc.GetDynName] has arrived at your court, attracted by your Axe Smithy.
[lf_new_demon.GetDynName] has arrived at your court, attracted by your Demonic Shrine.
[lf_new_divine.GetDynName] has arrived at your court, attracted by your Divine Chapel.
